messages.message:
FYI, in most customer presentations I've seen, we actively tout that we are able to use all of the OCR vendors - it is indeed a value add for us to call it out. The messaging is something like:

"Because we can use both ABBYY and Microsoft, we can choose the one that delivers the best results for that document. This is much more powerful than having to rely on only one. You can get better results with Instabase OCR than any one individual vendor."
